item.title: Visualizing Climate Data: A Tidy Tuesday Project from January 2020 using data from the Australia Wildfires
item.description: It’s been a while since I’ve posted on this blog or have worked on a Tidy Tuesday project, so I thought I’d revisit and post the project I did in January for R4DataScience to visualize climate data during the Australia wildfires earlier this year. .center { display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; } These heatmap visualizations were inspired by Nick Tierny’s tutorial on Github transform Australia’s Bureau of Meteorology’s heatmap data into viridis themed maps and plots.
